text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
…… Everyone has gathered here with their 
own dreams, carrying expectations.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I… want to live up to the expectations 
of everyone who supports me as well.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Just running with everything I have. 
Aiming for the road to the top……!
